title: Did Fox News ignore the news of Paul Manafort's accusation and cover Cheese's argument about the Umoji Burger?
subtitle: A joke about Fox News's coverage of Paul Manafort's accusation turned into allegations that the network had failed to cover political news at all.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Fox News didn't report urgent political news about Paul Manafort's accusation, and instead she covered the dispute.
